Some say life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
I wonder if you can refuse to inherit the world.
Life is just a game of Snakes and Ladders. Learn to befriend the snakes.
But the cure for most obstacles is, Be decisive.
You live but once; you might as well be amusing.
Imitation is the sincerest form of television.

plaintext: In the absence of justice what is sovereignty but organized robbery
title: [200 points] Solve this morbit by Saint Augustine
